body: My greatest annoyance is that unless it's NTR for some damn reason, English Translations on the other genres that have NO NTR seem to be on the "Long List" of happening! (You'll get the Jap AND Chinese LONG before you'll see a DECENT English!) unless the artist/group are extremely popular! Is there something behind the scenes I don't know about (like for example, just like what's attracting copy cats to NTR, is their alot more money to be made ENG translating NTR then the others?)
